author: Colin Campbell
comment: Can't change the watch face on Huawei watch 2

author: Gavin Pohlen
comment: Like the watch face however it does strange things when I get notifications. Rather than display ambient mode. It stays on some kind of mixture between both interactive and ambient. It's not right, I'm sure of that. Happy to change to 5 star if we can fix this...

author: Bill Dieffenbacher
comment: I like the looks easy to read like it alot also could there be a GPS selection along with the different weather selections

author: Jamie S
comment: Great thanks, love it. Can you please add all white background

author: Kjell J
comment: Looks and works great. A must have for wear users!
title: Wow!

author: RF Furlan
comment: Design (like Suunto watches) and fixed location (no waste of battery). Thanks
title: Great watch face

author: Thomas Muriel
comment: My get-go watch face. Reliable, lightweight, easy on battery and 100% functional. HEAVILY RECOMMENDED.

author: Steve Horlick
comment: There are lots of faces available, in my opinion this is the best.  Big day and time and still room for battery, weather, date & week number
title: This is the winner

author: sirsquirrel0
comment: I like this watch face, now one of my favourites. Ambient mode looks clear, better than many other watch faces. My only critiques would be the date field overlaps on the date text field (moto360g2), there is no step counter, no custom name branding and I am unable to change the background colour even after the changes are send to the watch.
title: Worth the small investment

author: Drew
comment: Use this face all the time. Wish there were more colors and that changing a color didn't require switching faces but it's worth it. Great looking watch face with an awesome layout.
title: Love it

author: Ian Coulson
comment: Great watch face for weekend motorsport events
title: Watch face

author: Ty Gandy
comment: Hands down best watchface on Google play. Had a small issue with not being able to connect to weather on my huawei. Contacted the dev and a few hrs later.. It works! Great job on this. Amazing customer support.Keep it up!
title: Best watch face A++

author: Dennis Wu
comment: Very quick dev support! Love the ambient mode on my Huawei watch. Please consider updating the watchface to enable interactive mode, would be nice to tap on the weather data and open the weather app. Keep up the great work!
title: Weather works again! Yay

author: Hugo Du Bois
comment: This is possibly the best looking LCD watch face around. It looks awesome on my huawei watch and the ambient mode is great as well.
title: Great look

author: Fausto Stubbs
comment: I can changes the color of my watch to go with my shirt or anything that I wear
title: Works great

author: Mario Reid
comment: This is my favorite watch face for my LG Urbane. In one glance I have the time, date, weather/temp and my phone/watch battery status. Initially I was experiencing some battery drain issues but managed to work around the problem by lowering the watch face screen brightness and reducing the weather update intervals.
title: My favorite watch face!!!

author: Jose Carlos
comment: Update - i got a new huawei watch and idk if it is my battery or the watch face. With this one im already at 66% from 8am to 10am. Is the watchface using too much battery??. I had a lg g watch and this did not happen####.           incredible, but after 1 week of use. It has a bug where it freezes randomly and i have to restart the watch, so until its fixed it doesnt deserve more than 1 star. Update, they fix it. Great support!!!
title: Is there a problem with the huawei watch??

author: Stuart Bache
comment: Of all the watch faces I keep trying, I always come back to this one.

author: Ilias K
comment: when the watch gets disconnected and connects again with the phone, the weather information is not restored. otherwise, a fine watchface.
title: Halfway there

author: steve jarvis
comment: Absolutely fantastic!! Looks really good on the LG urbane silver...added to my digital collection.. A must have!!   People think I've just  got  a digital watch..... ha...ha ..ha.
title: Go digital!!

author: Octane
comment: I love that it shows me my phone & watch battery life
title: I like it

author: Daniel Greenwood
comment: Loving this watchface on my silver LG Urbane. Looks brilliant and is extremely customisable.
title: Really Good

author: Hare Menjou
comment: Worth 9.9 dollars! Great settings!
title: Unbelievable !

author: Voluble Fox
comment: New favorite

author: WiL Patrickson
comment: As said above. Very disappointed.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you please send us your situation more in detail.
Please don't hesitate to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: Terrible battery life

author: Paul Yoo
comment: Love everything else but the wrong weather. Should use other source like yahoo..

author: Joel Contreras
comment: Won't connect with watch. Nothing. Can't get a refund anymore after trying to sync watchface.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Please give us more information about your situation.
I can give you a help.Please feel free to contact us.Thank you.

title: Connection

author: Richard Lee
comment: Useful information displayed in a well thought out way.
title: Great watch face

author: Amilkar Gonzalez
comment: The best watch face for LG R hands down. If you like the Suunto style of face just set the face to draw black and white and set the color to red. One upgrade for future revisions would be adding an outer ring that serves as a compass.
title: One of the best watch faces for LG R

author: Gweeds
comment: So configurable. So detailed,  so fantastic,  well worth the small fee. Keep up the good work
title: Awesome!

author: Simon Marshall
comment: Well displayed comprehensive info, with retro styling
title: Really great

author: Phil
comment: Awesome app. Loving it!

author: Lomas Persad
comment: One of the best looking faces

author: Krzysztof Nowik
comment: After updates finally battery usage is same like stock faces - 3 days on my LG watch R. Others developers should learn from Smartwatch Bureaux. Thank You!
title: Finally!

author: Jamie Spruce
comment: Excellent support from developer.
title: Bloody good. *Must have* watch face.

author: Lee McLean
comment: Cool

author: Jo Christian Buvarp
comment: After doing a factory reset the app says that it does not have a connection to wear device.  Tried reinstall of both watchface and Android wear app. Also tried once more with a factory reset.  Known problem? Tried your v03 watchface also. Same problem
title: Love the watchface but problem

author: lost localhost
comment: Initially didn't work with 5.0. Dev fixed within 24 hours of my complaint. Can't get any better than that. One of the best faces available-as well as their other options. Thanks!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app available for Android Wear 5.0 firmware.
Would you please check the update.Thank you.

title: Awesome...

author: Sasha M
comment: sorry to inform you, but even after the update which was probably meant to fix that android os update disaster, your one amazing face,  is horrible and inaccurate. i need refund please
title: disaster
